long_description: With specialized fabric that protects from slash-and-run thefts, the VentureSafe 65L GII Travel Pack from PacSafe lets you see the world without having to keep an eye on the gear in your pack. Areas of the pack most commonly vulnerable to slash-and-run thefts have slashproof, high-tensile stainless-steel eXomesh(R) wire laminated between the nylon layers. Puncture-resistant ToughZip(TM) prevents zippers from being compromised with a pen or similar sharp object, keeping your stuff in and unwanted items out. Roobar(TM) anti-theft anchor allows multiple straps and zippers to be locked with a single padlock. 3mm stainless steel locking cable with storange pouch lets you lock your bag to a secure fixture like a table or small tree, preventing thieves from running off with it. Interlocking zip pulls slide together and interconnect; when engaged with the Roobar(TM), even the most seasoned thieves will be at a loss. Front zippered compartment has 2 zip mesh pockets for internal organization; main compartment features large zippered mesh pockets; side pockets accommodate water bottles. Lightweight, ergonomic aluminum internal frame offers increased balance and support. Easy-to-adjust back harness features 5 height settings; top and side haul handles make it easy to carry. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps and waist belt provide a comfortable fit; straps zip away for protection in transit. Flap cover disguises locking system and can hold a jacket; bottom straps attach sleeping bag or mat. The VentureSafe 65L GII Travel Pack from PacSafe has internal and side compression straps to help stabilize the load.
short_description: With specialized fabric that protects from slash-and-run thefts, the VentureSafe 65L GII Travel Pack from PacSafe lets you see the world without having to keep an eye on the gear in your pack.
